title: Technology Sector Equities in Motion -- Qorvo, Maxim Integrated Products, AU Optronics, Freescale Semiconductor, and NTELOS Holdings
text: Technology Sector Equities in Motion -- Qorvo, Maxim Integrated Products, AU Optronics, Freescale Semiconductor, and NTELOS Holdings »   Published on 2015-09-16 07:47:45 Technology Sector Equities in Motion -- Qorvo, Maxim Integrated Products, AU Optronics,... -- NEW YORK, September  - <-   NEW YORK , September  - Equity Research Institute has initiated coverage on the following equities: Qorvo Inc. (NASDAQ: QRVO ), Maxim Integrated Products Inc. (NASDAQ: MXIM ), AU Optronics Corporation (NYSE: AUO ), Freescale Semiconductor Ltd (NYSE: FSL ), and NTELOS Holdings Corporation (NASDAQ: NTLS ). Free research report on Qorvo can be accessed at https://www.erionline.net/reports?keyword=QRVO On Tuesday, September 15, 2015 , the NASDAQ Composite ended at 4,860.52, up 1.14%, the Dow Jones Industrial Average advanced 1.40%, to finish the day at 16,599.85, and the S&P 500 closed at 1,978.09, up 1.28%. The gains were broad based as all the sectors ended the session in positive. Register for your complimentary reports at the links given below. Qorvo Inc.'s stock lost 1.42%, to close Tuesday's session at $52.73 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 1.83 million shares, below its three months average volume of 2.65 million shares. Over the last one month and the previous three months, Qorvo Inc.'s shares have lost 9.46% and 37.78%, respectively. Additionally, the stock has declined 25.10% since the start of this year. The company is trading 15.53% and 25.82% below its 50-day and 200-day moving averages, respectively. Furthermore, Qorvo Inc.'s stock traded at a PE ratio of 25.23 and has a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 37.76. Sign up and read the free notes on QRVO at: https://www.erionline.net/reports?keyword=QRVO Maxim Integrated Products Inc.'s stock finished Tuesday's session 0.32% lower at $34.24 . A total of 1.87 million shares were traded, which was below its three months average volume of 2.87 million shares. Over the last one month and the previous three months, Maxim Integrated Products Inc.'s shares have advanced 2.60% and 1.37%, respectively. Furthermore, the stock has gained 10.17% since the beginning of 2015. The company's shares are trading above their 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 4.14% and 3.74%, respectively. Maxim Integrated Products Inc.'s stock traded at a PE ratio of 48.23 and has an RSI of 58.63. The complimentary notes on MXIM can be downloaded in PDF format at: https://www.erionline.net/reports?keyword=MXIM On Tuesday, shares in AU Optronics Corp. ended the session 1.20% higher at $3.38 . The stock reported a trading volume of 1.30 million shares, below its three months average volume of 1.94 million shares. Shares of the company traded at a PE ratio of 4.90. Although, AU Optronics Corp.'s shares have gained 11.55% in the last one month, it has lost 27.00% in the previous three months and 33.60% on YTD basis. The company is trading 1.00% below its 50-day moving average and 27.64% below its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of AU Optronics Corp. have an RSI of 57.32. Register for free on Equity Research Institute and access the latest research on AUO at: https://www.erionline.net/reports?keyword=AUO Freescale Semiconductor Ltd's stock edged 0.16% higher, to close the day at $37.77 . The stock recorded a trading volume of 0.74 million shares, much below its three months average volume of 2.05 million shares. Over the last one month and over the past three months, Freescale Semiconductor Ltd's shares have lost 0.40% and 9.71%, respectively. However, the stock has gained 49.70% since the start of this year. The company's shares are trading 4.16% above their 200-day moving average. Additionally, Freescale Semiconductor Ltd traded at a PE ratio of 31.21 and has an RSI of 55.17. The complete research on FSL is available for free at: https://www.erionline.net/reports?keyword=FSL On Tuesday, shares in NTELOS Holdings Corp. recorded a trading volume of 0.32 million shares, lower than their three months average volume of 0.72 million shares. The stock ended the day 0.11% lower at $9.09 . Although, NTELOS Holdings Corp.'s stock has lost 1.52% in the last one month, it has surged 63.49% in the previous three months and 116.95% on YTD basis. The company is trading above its 50-day and 200-day moving averages by 24.70% and 54.18%, respectively. Furthermore, shares of NTELOS Holdings Corp. have an RSI of 69.66.
